DataElement.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure CD4-Positive T-Lymphocyte Outcome Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: a yes/no/unknown/not available indicator related to the result of the medical procedure that involves testing a sample of blood for CD4+ T-lymphocyte, a type of white blood cell that helps stimulate immune system reactions.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the result of the medical procedure that involves testing a sample of blood for CD4+ T-lymphocyte, a type of white blood cell that helps stimulate immune system reactions.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something.

Concepts.definition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.

Property.preferredDefinition: A type of white blood cell that helps stimulate immune system reactions.  Helper T cells help activate cytotoxic T cells and macrophages by secreting cytokines. They also stimulate B cells to make antibodies.:Outcome; a phenomenon that follows and is caused by some previous phenomenon.

Concepts.definition: A type of white blood cell that helps stimulate immune system reactions.  Helper T cells help activate cytotoxic T cells and macrophages by secreting cytokines. They also stimulate B cells to make antibodies.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: a yes/no/unknown/not available/not applicable indicator related to the result of an assessment.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Information regarding the subject is unknown or inaccessible at this time.

Concepts.definition: Information regarding the subject is unknown or inaccessible at this time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
